text: <@U026PHQ3J> / <@U02E3CRMA> I just pushed some updates fixing the heat/timer drag UI issues from yesterday. Everything is working fine now with the data we get from Node. Was only able to test with the rig a couple times so the drag range may be too wide or narrow but that can be easily adjusted. I'll be home/online all day so don't hesitate to ask questions if there's anything I can help with.
I'm just making my chemex and you're already pushing source. I gotta get moving!!
Ha. That stuff should've been fixed days ago. Glad it's done now.
pinch logic is in master, but I didn't restart since there's a pot on the cooktop
Cool. I'll be in in about an hour
I can take the pot off
alright, rig is now reporting pinch events
we'll have to adjust it a bit to find the right space above the cooktop where we want to grab pinch gestures, but it's a 1-liner to fix that
This is the cat filter. It is a 3 frame running bitwise AND mask that will be applied to the current frame to kill noise
